needVerifyIdDescriptions: To register your content, you are required to verify your identification. The Verification process will take a few minutes. This process can help to protect your content and your payment within app.

reaNameNotice: Ensure to use your full name as stated in E-KTP, this cannot be edited at later stage
uploadIdCardNotice1: Make sure you upload an E-KTP photo taken directly from the cellphone camera
uploadIdCardNotice2: Original E-KTP photo or in your own name
uploadIdCardNotice3: Upload a physical E-KTP photo, not a photocopy
uploadIdCardNotice4: The photo of the E-KTP is not damaged, for example cracked or broken
uploadIdCardNotice5: The photo of the E-KTP is clear, not blurry, the light is bright enough and not cut off
uploadIdCardNotice6: Photo E-KTP does not use flask
uploadIdCardNotice7: Make sure the selfie you take is facing the front with sufficient lighting, without flash and not cropped
uploadIdCardNotice8: If you have followed the method above, but it doesn't work, you can complain about this problem to the Hyppe Help Center 081398582108
cameraTakeIdCardInfo: Place your KTP within the frame
placeBirthNote: Please enter your place of birth as stated in E-KTP
selectDateBirthInfo: Please enter your date of birth as stated in E-KTP (hh-bb-tttt)
confirmIdGenuine: By Continuing I hereby declare that the data I have filled in is accurate and genuine
confirmIdNotice: This verification process can only be made once, make sure the data is matched with your ID.
supportDocNotice1: You can upload supporting documents such as, Family Identity Card, Passport, and Driver's License issued legally by the country
supportDocNotice2: Make sure your full name is listed on your family identity card
supportDocNotice3: Make sure your name and ID Number on the family identity card can be read clearly and in matches with the ID card that you uploaded earlier
supportDocNotice4: Supporting documents such as a passport, you can upload the front page of your passport which displays your photo and full name
supportDocNotice5: Make sure your Driver's License full name matches the ID card that you uploaded earlier
supportDocNotice6: Make sure your supporting documents are original
supportDocNotice7: Upload a original supporting document, not a copy
supportDocNotice8: The photo of the supporting document is not damaged, for example torn, cracked, blurry, broken, and/or dirty
supportDocNotice9: Do not use flash for taking the photo
supportDocNotice10: If you have followed the method above, but it doesn't work, you can complain about this problem to the Hyppe Help Center 081398582108
failedIdCardInfoTitle: We're sorry, your previous request was not able to be processed
failedIdCardInfo1: E-KTP is blurred or damaged beyond recognition.
failedIdCardInfo3: NIK and selfie doesn't match with E-KTP photo.
failedIdCardInfo4: Supporting documents doesn't match with E-KTP photo and selfie.
failedIdCardInfo5: E-KTP is already registered in Hyppe App.
failedIdCardInfo6: Fraudulent and/or malicious attempts against the law is detected.
successIdCardTitle: Your account is now Premium. Now you can enjoy these greats benefits:
successIdCard1: Register Content Ownership to get Ownership Certificate
successIdCard4: Send balance to your Bank Account
dataDidntShow: The data shown did not match with your ID?
